comments:
Description:
Exception is thrown out when preview results of a joint data set joining from a sample and a flat

Build number:
2.1.3.v20070524-0800

Steps to reproduce:
1. New a sample Data Set from table "CUSTOMERS".
2. New a flat file Data Set from the attached csv file.
3. New a joint Data Set: "Flat STATE" Inner Join "CUSTOMERS STATE".
4. Click "Preview Results".

Expected result:
No exception.

Actual result:
Exception show up.

Error log:
org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.core.DataException: Column binding "FLAT::CUSTOMERNUMBER" has referred to a data set column "FLAT::CUSTOMERNUMBER" which is not exist.
at org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.impl.ResultIterator.validateManualBindingExpressions(ResultIterator.java:147)
at org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.impl.ResultIterator.<init>(ResultIterator.java:122)
at org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.impl.QueryResults.getResultIterator(QueryResults.java:158)
at org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.data.ui.dataset.ResultSetPreviewPage.populateRecords(ResultSetPreviewPage.java:465)
at org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.data.ui.dataset.ResultSetPreviewPage.access$200(ResultSetPreviewPage.java:88)
at org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.data.ui.dataset.ResultSetPreviewPage$5.run(ResultSetPreviewPage.java:414)
at org.eclipse.jface.operation.ModalContext$ModalContextThread.run(ModalContext.java:113)

traces.message: Column binding "FLAT::CUSTOMERNUMBER" has referred to a data set column "FLAT::CUSTOMERNUMBER" which is not exist.
